name: Bag of Tricks
description:
Bag of Tricks is a metroidvania game where you explore the diverse magical land inside of a magicians bag and play as the Kid Magician, depressed after a recent show gone wrong. Using his own magic tricks to fight new ones, you must find the way to escape the bag of tricks and rekindle your love for magic

Play as the Kid Magician using classic magic show tools such as playing cards, a magic wand, smoke bombs and more, in order to reach the end goal of leaving the bag of tricks. You will come across enemies known as 'Trickies' which are based on classic tricks and come in all shapes and sizes- be wary of rabbits comically shooting at you out of hats! Encounter a local rabbit that acts as your guiding voice, helping you along the way to understand how to use your tricks and giving you tips, but be wary, as he wont hesitate to give you a piece of his mind! Uncover secrets hidden around each of the unique areas to make your exploration a lot less stressful.

ESC- Pause

W- Look/Aim up

A-Run Left

D- Run Right

Space – Jump

J- Accept/Melee Attack

K (Press)- Ranged Attack

K (Hold)- Hypnosis beam

R (Hold)- Reload

L- Ascend Stage Wires

Shift (in air)- Smoke Bomb
